data.actual_result: The keyboard resets, switching back to the default view. This also breaks autocorrect and sometimes moves the cursor.
data.expected_result: The keyboard should not be reset and you should be able to continue typing your message without interruption
data.short_description: The text entry field resets when the channel name or topic changes, resetting the keyboard and breaking autocorrect.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord to a channel where you have the manage channel permission on your phone and one other device - Open the touch keyboard on your phone and switch to the numbers and symbols view - On the other device, change the channel name or topic
